org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.common
Class PersistenceManagerXml

java.lang.Object
  org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.common.PersistenceManagerXml
public class PersistenceManagerXml
extends java.lang.Object

The PersistenceManagerXmlImpl provides easy access to marshal/unmarshal Java objects to XML files
